website_summaries.verdict: An all-around excellent choice in terms of comfort, durability, and grip.
pros: This lightweight boot gets high marks in several categories, including comfort, durability, and traction
A great-looking option that requires very little to no break-in
cons: Some buyers report quality issues with the leather
The boot is too narrow for some

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots. Only took Roughly 10 days to break them into trail ready status. Have done two twenty mile hikes in the Pisgah National forest and one 30 mile backpacking trip on the Mountain to sea Trail. They felt amazing! Only one hot spot on my heel formed that I contribute to choice of thinner socks. Wish they breath a little better. Feet got fairly warm a few times. Soles of the boots still look brand new and havehdld very well this far. I'm 6', weight 300 and distribute most of my weight tho the outside heel area of my feet so I go through shoes fairly fast but feel these will last me for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Tyewhan Luke

customer_reviews.title: Vasque shoes are excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased Vasque shoes as my everyday shoe for several years. This is the first boot style that I have purchased. These fit exactly as I expected from having experience with the company. They run a little narrower than most brands, but not overly so, but even thought they run narrow, do not run small. This is why I like Vasque shoes. They were comfortable from the first wearing. The only drawback is that this particular style is warm. It is all leather and waterproof. My foot heats up.
customer_reviews.author: Yendis

customer_reviews.title: Great Support for a bad back
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very particular about the shoes that he wears because most cause very bad back pain for him. These are the only shoes he will wear. He does have to have special inserts to give him extra arch support as he has extremely high arches, but even most other shoes will not work with the inserts. He wears these shoes from morning to night. He doesn't take his shoes off until he is getting ready for bed. He's had them for 3 months now and they are still in perfect condition. They are very durable, and provide him with great traction. He works in construction, so he is not easy on them.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki F.

customer_reviews.title: Fine for office, if you're hiking there's better out there.
customer_reviews.text: I've hiked about 100 miles in these so far. They're holding up well. The only problem with fit is they're a little narrow around the toes is laced evenly; I have to leave some slack near the toes. The cushioning and the rigidity of the sole could be improved as well. I'll probably not repeat buy these but I'll stick with them until they die.
customer_reviews.author: E. P. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best boots I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best boots I've ever owned! I live in Alaska and wear them almost everyday for just walking around. I've never had a pair of boots that fit my feet so perfectly...I almost hate to take them off at night. I bought these about 6 months ago and they've held up extremely well to Alaska's terrain. I can't recommend them highly enough. I'm going to purchase the low cut version for Summer.
customer_reviews.author: bjordan61

customer_reviews.title: Great boot and great company
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair we have bought. Fit is perfect for my husband and very little time to break in. The sole of the first pair did wear out perhaps due to walking the dogs on the street. I contacted Vasque customer service and explained that the boot's sole did not last as long as we had expected. They asked that I ship them the boots. About 10 days later we received a free pair even though our one year warranty had expired. Love the customer service! In the meantime my husband love the boot so much we ordered this second pair. He will be a Vasque customer for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Wrigley's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: These boots have really taken wear. Very good, specially on rainy days. Though not fully water-proof (cannot wade through streams), they keep your feet dry in weather that you can walk in with a rain jacket. The size is smaller when compared to other brands I have tried, such as Merrell and New Balance.
customer_reviews.author: S1289C

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: I'm from a construction family and I got my first pair of work boots when I was 10 years old. And these are the finest pair of boots I have ever worn! Almost no break in period. Lightweight and nearly waterproof. When tightly tied it can take up to an hour of being completely submerged in water before sock's get wet. I can walk all day and my rarely get sore.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Getz

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this boot because I have always liked Vibram soles and although the soles on this boot have held up well, the uppers did not and worse yet the boot was small. I wore these anyway for about 8 months and regret it because this pair was too small - suffered discomfort and developed a corn on one of my toes. If you but these, amke sure to get at least a half size larger.
customer_reviews.author: mtnman

customer_reviews.title: "best ever "
customer_reviews.text: I have another pair of these so I knew what to expect. they run about one and a half size smaller than other shoes so if you wear a 9.5 in your other shoes you need to get an 11 in these and you won't be disappointed . I walk on an average of about 6 miles a day on our job sights and these are by far the best pair of shoes I've ever owned. very highly recommend them !!
customer_reviews.author: prime

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just had back fusion a few weeks ago and the doctor said I need to walk so I purchased these in the hopes they would be good hiking shoes not only on roads but on paths also. These fit the bill. Very comfortable. I have only been able to hike 6 miles so far, but that is in the mountains - lots of ups and downs. I ordered an 11 wide as that is what Amazon recommended. I usually wear a 10 1/2 wide. These fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Riften

customer_reviews.title: Vasque makes a great product. I live in Chicago
customer_reviews.text: Vasque makes a great product. I live in Chicago. I use these for casual as well as hiking. My feet are somewhat narrow. My shoe size is 8 to 8.5. Ordered the 8.5. Tied on many boots and brands (Columbia, Merrell, and Keen). No contest with fit and comfort. You must wear these around the house for a few days to break in. My feet have poor circulation. Always cold. Just went out on a two mile hike at 18 degrees. The combination of Vasque Talus and Darn Good Vermont Ultralight sock were perfect. Search no more!
customer_reviews.author: JohnyGolf

customer_reviews.title: ... had these boots for about 6 months and they're fantastic. I hike once or twice a week anywhere ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had these boots for about 6 months and they're fantastic. I hike once or twice a week anywhere from 2 to 20 miles. Very, very lightweight, much lighter than my last North Face boots. There was no break-in time; they were comfortable right out of the box. The waterproofing seems pretty effective in wading through creeks. The Vibram sole, of course, is very durable and hardly shows any wear yet. And the style can't be beat. It has the features of a flashy technical boot but the look of a timeless classic.
customer_reviews.author: BLSeel

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for an all day comfortable boot, without weird size problems that seem to ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots for casual hiking (few-5 miles at a time), and rockhounding. I was looking for an all day comfortable boot, without weird size problems that seem to happen nowadays with shoes. They are extremely comfortable, and my feet did not start to hurt or get fatigued in any way after 4-5 hours of climbing thru rock piles. They are strong and sturdy, and they do not make my feet sweat.....even thought they are ultra-dry. I will take them to Utah this summer and submit a further update after many days of hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Charles K.

customer_reviews.title: From the first time you put them on, great comfortable fee.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pair of Hiking Boots on the recommendation of others: "comfortable from first time you put them on". How true! I have been disappointed in past purchases from local stores when boots felt okay at first but never improved. So I was skeptical about buying on-line without a chance to try them on. But these are winners. Waterproof and fit -- just great.
customer_reviews.author: path0103

customer_reviews.title: Nice Boots!
customer_reviews.text: The boots felt great from the moment I put them on! Now, with about 30 "break in" hiking miles on them, they are feeling even better. I'm looking forward - after my 50 mile break in rule - to a long hike to really test them. So far, so good. The quality seems to be excellent, as I had anticipated based on research and conversation with long time Vasque aficionado. As long as they hold up well, I'll be very pleased with this significant ($$) purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Awsome Treads
customer_reviews.text: The fit is as though my foot was the pattern for the shoe, not tight nor loose. After a few days of wear they are an extension of my leg. They have a trim profile but manage to incorporate a great amount of stability into your step, and with their spiff looks they go anywhere. And if you can not see to wear the red laces, they come with an alternate pair of brown ones in the box. What's not to like? Nothing at all!
customer_reviews.author: be

customer_reviews.title: As rated, maybe better
customer_reviews.text: I spotted these boots in an outdoor magazine where people said they were comfortable the first day. After a year of wearing them (for outdoor activities) I agree that they are very comfortable, even with with a bad foot that has plagued me for years.
customer_reviews.author: BLW

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a recent model Vasque
customer_reviews.text: Boots fit as expected for a hiking boot (meaning had to order one size up). They are water resistant up to the ankle, but you obviously can't fully submerge your leg in water. Wore these comfortably without any breaking in for a 4 mile hike to a waterfall. Good traction, even on the wet rocks and on a steep incline. Comes with extra shoe laces in black.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon A. Steele

customer_reviews.title: My favorite light hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: Finally found boots that fit. These are light-hikers. I wear them to work when it rains, and I've also worn them on 2 backcountry camping trips. Not much warmth, but that's not what they're design for. They are somewhere in between a tennis shoe and a full-on boot.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well-made
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well-made, but not wide enough. I can’t find serious hiking footwear in a 4E width anywhere. My last was a pair of Vasque Sundowners bought in 2000 they were great. There were also the last pair of good hiking boots I’ve seen offered in a 4E width.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE. Pure unadulterated love
customer_reviews.text: LOVE. Pure unadulterated love. Bought slightly larger as others recommended. Warm, waterproof, supportive, nurturing and strong. Vibram soles allow you to catch the corner of a rock or root and feel like you are on flat ground. Had a pair of Vasques many years ago during a turbulent, trail-filled era. They never did me wrong then and this have not done me wrong now. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Condition of Boots the Issue
customer_reviews.text: Boots are more narrow compared to other brands of the same size. The boots arrived new in the box but had some black adhesive or other compound on one side of one boot. The toe areas appear as if they have wear. Returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: kindleblur

customer_reviews.title: a bit tight for the published size.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good boot, but I think they build them fairly "tight". I have a fairly flat foot that's between a 10 and 10.5US. I bought the 10.5 "E" width. I'm almost ready to send it back for an 11. If you tend to wear heavier socks or liner/boot sock combos, definitely round up a size. Otherwise they seem like a nice boot so far
customer_reviews.author: redhed

customer_reviews.title: Five star boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. These are great shoes and did not require any breaking in at all. I was hesitant after reading some of the reviews that they would require a lot of breaking in, but like majority of the reviewers said, they were comfortable from day one. I ordered a half size bigger to allow for a hiking sock and to account for when my feet swell after a long day of walking. The Beluga/Old Gold color looks great and blends in well with jeans. I will most likely keep replacing my hiking shoes with these in the future as long as they are still being made! Don't think twice about buying these boots.
customer_reviews.author: WS

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but not good for work.
customer_reviews.text: Used this shoe for work, although suggested as a hiking shoe, the sole doesn’t grab well on wet surfaces such as rocks. They are nice otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: T. Thurston

customer_reviews.title: Comfy not durable
customer_reviews.text: These are the MOST COMFORTABLE shoes you will ever own. I got them to replace my work boots and you can't beat the feel. My feet aren't tired. I'd wear them in place of my sneakers too. Only problem is for the price I would have hoped they would last longer especially for the price. The leather on the side cracked where my foot bends and water can get in.
customer_reviews.author: Jennaration Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Like many reviewers have stated
customer_reviews.text: Like many reviewers have stated, these boots required no break-in time. I was so pleased with the fit and the waterproofing on the boot was superb. Took these boots the day after I got them up a 14er with zero problems. 100% would recomend
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: sizing
customer_reviews.text: i like these shoes and they are stretching a little.they are well made but i would recommend to someone who wears a 4 e to buy one size larger not a half size larger
customer_reviews.author: terrence trask

customer_reviews.title: Much better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: didn't break these in before my hike and only got a couple of small blisters from a 60 mile multi day hike on rough terrain. I got wet from stepping in streams multiple times, so I expected my feet to get destroyed but they didn't. Much better than I expected, by far the most comfortable boots and easiest on the skin I have ever used
customer_reviews.author: adam kim

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots, runs true to size (maybe a little small), gets scuffed up without toe cap
customer_reviews.text: I've got about 75 miles on these now, and couldn't say enough good things about them. They run pretty close to true size, maybe a little on the smaller size. The color is great, but since it doesn't have a toe cap, the front does it scuffed up (but they look pretty good scuffed up). Most importantly, the fit is perfect. Very supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: For longer trail hikes, the ankle support is helpful. Feet are different from one person to the next, but these fit mine perfectly. Very comfortable. Nice fit, nice light weight. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: R9

customer_reviews.title: This is my second pair of these boots. I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these boots. I actually bought two pairs this time. One pair for work, the other for play. My first pair lasted over a year, wearing them to work everyday. In my line of work, my boots get wet a lot, but my feet have stayed dry in these. My job is hell on boots, and if these can last over a year doing my job, I would bet that these would last a lifetime for someone that wore them on an occasional hike.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Durable
customer_reviews.text: My husband got these for backpacking. He had a 25 lb pack and found these shoes to be really comfortable with the extra impact. We actually originally bought them at REI but returned them and bought theme here, saving $25 dollars. He has small feet--size 7 mens I think (bad wife, I know). They fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: mlfrederick

customer_reviews.title: I am glad to say I made the right decision on purchasing ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these boots for Geocaching. This involves sometimes extremely long days out in the woods. I am glad to say I made the right decision on purchasing these boots. They are comfortable and have held up well to the punishment I have dealt out.
customer_reviews.author: ironfistr

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, good support
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, good support, excellent up and down steep gradients. Seem durable, and I may award more stars in a few month's time.
customer_reviews.author: Fred J Kruger

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: Hubby typically only wears Red wings but these fit great and he really likes them.
customer_reviews.author: BdRobinson

customer_reviews.title: Do not last long
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on Sept. 5th of this year and as you can see already on Nov. 13th
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: not identical
customer_reviews.text: the left shoe was perfect. the right shoe came with a hard sew'd portion on my ankle that kept scratching it and made it all red and irritated. luckily i was wearing thick socks but the back ankle of it was poorly made. the left shoe did not have the same hard line.
customer_reviews.author: GN

customer_reviews.title: If you have wide feet get the wide size, ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have wide feet get the wide size, otherwise you'll be in pain. Boot is very supportive around ankles and kept my feet dry in wet conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Hman

customer_reviews.title: Nice Surprise
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a Garmont boot, but the model I like isn't made anymore. Oh well; I tried the Vasque Talus based on several reviews. I was a little apprehensive, but reassured knowing that I could return it. Verdict? These boots are comfy and look great!I have really flat feet and Looks a little better than the standard hiking boot, so I feel ok wearing it to work or nice dinner.
customer_reviews.author: John Strecker

customer_reviews.title: Some of the best hiking boots I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best hiking boots I've owned. Well-made, good support and did not take long to break in. Really happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! It is more of an everyday boot for me then a hiking boot. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: JamiDanielle

customer_reviews.title: Great boot for hiking
customer_reviews.text: If you normally can wear Vasque boots then this model will fit you fine. Break in time is minimal. I wore them at home hiking and then used them on an extensive trekking trip. The all leather boot is an added bonus on rocky and rough trails. The Vibram sole provides excellent traction and wear. The boots are fairly light for an all leather boot.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: These boots are great for light backpacking and day hiking
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great for light backpacking and day hiking. I wore them for 2 days at work to break them in, which I don't think was necessary but better safe than sorry. They preformed extremely well on a weekend backpacking trip into Desolation Wilderness. I had a 50lb pack on for 15 miles with no issues. I highly recommend these for anything from a light work boot to a light backpacking boot. Happy trails!
customer_reviews.author: Toby Farkas

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. Gave 4 because the sizes are small and narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Fixit

customer_reviews.title: Lacking longevity
customer_reviews.text: These boots are incredibly comfortable but the leather has become disconnected from the sole after only 8 months. Had this same problem with my last pair of vasque boots but those lasted a year and a half, that's more like it. 8 months is just shoddy.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Excellent  hiking boot
customer_reviews.text: My size for this model of hiking boots is 9.5 W(2E), the toes feel much better; also I am size 9.5 in timberland Chocorua, size 9.5 in Columbia Master of Faster, This talus Wide model is perfect. Very comfortable for being hiker with a backpack up to 30 pound. Good ankle support to prevent foot and ankle fatigue The construction is high quality. Short breaking period. They are truly waterproof. Decent grip on wet rock. Light shoes. Five days in Torres del Paine, Patagonia..... wet conditions.. cold weather.. good performance. Excellent grip in any terrain.
customer_reviews.author: Manolo R

customer_reviews.title: Solid boots for hiking, water, and snow
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a hybrid product for multiple activities. I wore this to a snow tubing trip and was amazed at the traction, protection, and warmth it retained in the snow. It's a solid fit, looks great, and is relatively affordable for an all-purpose boot.
customer_reviews.author: R. Shah

customer_reviews.title: Great boot! No break in required
customer_reviews.text: Great boot! No break in required. I have worn these boots to work everyday for a year and have not had one issue.
customer_reviews.author: Cael’s

customer_reviews.title: Worst hiking boots I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: These boots are garbage. god forbid you walk over a slightly damp rock, you will fall on your ass. I have never seen a boot with less traction than this. Maybe good as bowling shoes. DO NOT BUY THIS GARBAGE.
customer_reviews.author: J. Frey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Boot!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this boot. I tried it on at REI first, and then got a much better price here on Amazon. This boot is truly amazing. Kept my foot very comfortable during 3-day backcountry backpacking in Denali National Park. I will note that this is my first and only hiking boot I've ever worn or owned. Still-awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: David Woh

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good solid shoe. I'm Hard on zapatos & these hold up pretty well while remaining comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: John Malone

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: I love my boots! Comfy, stylish, rugged, waterproof. A lot of people are saying there narrow, which almost turned my off of them but im glad I gave them a shot because after an initial short break in of about a week they fit like a glove! They also come with a bonus pair of laces in a dark brown if your not into the red.
customer_reviews.author: Amadjinn

customer_reviews.title: A comfortable hiking boot.
customer_reviews.text: An excellent hiking shoe. Fits well right out of the box. My only complaint is, I would have liked better cushioning. The cushioning is only slightly above average.
customer_reviews.author: Jan M. Jablonsky

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: About what I expected. I had other Vasque boots and this one has the same well built, thoughtful construction as the others. Sturdy, great sole for traction and comfort. I like the boot a lot and am thinking of other Vasque shoes in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Williams

customer_reviews.title: and they felt great. Not a lot of ups and downs on ...
customer_reviews.text: Wore them for about a 6 mile hike first time out of the box, and they felt great. Not a lot of ups and downs on the hike, although it was in the snow and wanted to break them in with an easier trek, including some street walking. Time will tell, but they kept me dry and fit really well. I would say they run about a half size smaller than my usual size. I tried on a pair at a store before buying through Amazon, so I knew they ran a little small and ordered a half size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Get at least a size larger. They are narrow, and I have narrow feet. The arch support is average.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G.

customer_reviews.title: but these felt like 10. 5
customer_reviews.text: I always wear size 11, but these felt like 10.5. Sent back for 11.5, fits perfect. Order half size larger, great boot !
customer_reviews.author: red

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I purchased them for my husband to wear to work; he thanks me quite often for buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are great! I originally bought them for just hiking
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great! I originally bought them for just hiking, but they are so comfortable. I where them running errands too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe right out of the box. Wish they would have shorter laces.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence E Czyz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Comfortable and perfect for bad winter weather! Have great traction and go great with anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and durable! My husband is a carpenter and he wears these day in and day out.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M

customer_reviews.title: Great boots for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great boots for the price. Wore on an archery elk hunt in CO. Hiked about 3-4 miles a day and only had one week prior to break in. No problem. No blisters. Comfortable, light, dry and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Riesen, III

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots, fit as expected, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son's hiking trip. He says they're fantastic, required little break-in, and fit generally true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Bandolier

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit right out of the box. Really comfortable and looks amazing. There was an ice storm a few days ago and I wore these out. Perfect traction, warmth and completely waterproof. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes, will buy another pair when these wear out.
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit and very comfortable. And I am picky, its hard for me to get a comfortable fit. They also seem to be well made so far.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: But excellent boots.
customer_reviews.text: Did my husband just a little tight in the toe section. But excellent boots.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy P

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfort right out of the box. No break in period needed.
customer_reviews.author: john virshek

customer_reviews.title: It's a beautiful boot and for others
customer_reviews.text: Having worn my Vasque Zephyr GTX boots for several years and many summits, I wanted these Talus to fit in a similar manner. But alas, it was not to be. These boots are tighter and narrower than the aforementioned Zephyr and pinch at the tongue. It's a beautiful boot and for others, it may work perfectly. Just not for me. I wish Vasque would bring back the BOA lacing system as it provides excellent cinching and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Green Mountain Audi

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfert no uncomfortable break in peiord like ...
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and comfert no uncomfortable break in peiord like that they came with a spare set of laces look good and feel great !
customer_reviews.author: Randall B King

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier with these boots
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier with these boots. Pulled them out of the box and did a 10 mile hike that day. The fit was great and they kept my feet dry and cool. The only thing i did not test was how waterproof they are. But all in all these are fantastic boots.
customer_reviews.author: S.G.

customer_reviews.title: ... right boot totally blew out left boot is still great I've bought this brand for 20 yrs first big ...
customer_reviews.text: This boot worked for half a season in Michigan the right boot totally blew out left boot is still great I've bought this brand for 20 yrs first big disappointment I'll probly buy it 1 more time or never again
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Wilkens

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, but a seam tore on the padding for both heals after a few weeks of light use.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: Vasque hiking boots are great and fit like slippers, recommend this company excellent product look into them you won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Keith H.

customer_reviews.title: The boots are extremely comfortable and look great
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time buying Vasque hiking boots and I must say that I'm VERY impressed. The boots are extremely comfortable and look great. I will report more after I get a chance to abuse them a bit in the woods!
customer_reviews.author: KMS2015

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Best walking boots I have owned, this was the second pair I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: JFT

customer_reviews.title: sweet shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great out of the box fit. Even comes with a second set of laces. I'm very impressed with the boot. Worth the extra little bit of money if you're comparing it to something less expensive
customer_reviews.author: Lou D.

customer_reviews.title: Don't quite work for me
customer_reviews.text: The boots rub against my ankle bones. I figure it will take some time to break in the boots or my skin. I haven't worn them much but their fit and comfort level is as expected other than rubbing against my ankle bones.
customer_reviews.author: sara greene

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable boots however I have not done a lot of hiking but, mire daily wear and the top of the toes are getting worn down quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jen G

customer_reviews.title: Great boot !!
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box comfort. Nothing bad to say. Vasque went above and beyond. Great boot, never been disappointed with anything I own from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Quintero

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots, they are very comfy and break in ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice boots, they are very comfy and break in quick. I returned a pair of Keen and Danner before getting these. Wish I would have picked these first.
customer_reviews.author: bobby forehand

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great, right out of the box. Trying to save them for the trail but I keep wanting to wear them to work
customer_reviews.author: IanC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and light weight. Still feels good after 10 hours!
customer_reviews.author: HWJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and confortable hiking boots!
customer_reviews.text: Best, best, best!!! Very happy with my new hiking boots!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: but these are great. Just right for cool days when 7-8" boots ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't bought Vasque in years, but these are great. Just right for cool days when 7-8" boots are too warm. I definitely prefer them to the many other brands I've tried over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Eric G.

customer_reviews.title: Right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned many boots, and was skeptical about ordering online, but these were perfect right out of the box. Even for my feet (which run a little wide), the Talus boots are a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: D. Albares

customer_reviews.title: They feel great...
customer_reviews.text: Everything was fine ,. the Hocking boots fit perfectly and I didn't have to break them in.they feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Mey

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. They are light but take some getting use ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for tactical training. So far so good. They are light but take some getting use to for me for running in them.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and construction
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Size is accurate. Construction seems to be top notch. Comes with 2 sets of laces, yellow and gray if the yellow is too flashy. Comfortable from the first time I put the shoe on.
customer_reviews.author: Jared R Everson

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: Best boots I have owned. Even the break-in was comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Schoenecker

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great boots... still breaking them in. So good so far.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best work shoe we have ever find. Comfortable and very durable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit is perfect. I have had other Vasque boots in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit is perfect. I have had other Vasque boots in the past and this is superior quality to other like brands.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Layton

customer_reviews.title: Good Boot
customer_reviews.text: They came a little more green than I had expected. They looked more brown on line. Good Boot, great price.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes and very comfortable. A little snug in the width, but still some of the best boots I have ever had. Lightweight and although waterproof, seem to breathe fairly well.
customer_reviews.author: David P

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots!!
customer_reviews.text: Took these puppies right out of the box and hiked 12 mi. Totes good boots, sturdy, no blistering, waterproof as all getout.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Winter/Summer Boots
customer_reviews.text: Not too warm in the summer. Keeps my feet dry and warm (up to the laces) in the snow. Very comfortable and low profile (fashionable). I will wear these shoes down to the sole.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan G.

customer_reviews.title: Great boots. I will be buying this brand agin ...
customer_reviews.text: Great boots. I will be buying this brand agin if not the same boots s.
customer_reviews.author: AAJ

product_meta.title: Vasque Men's Talus Ultradry Hiking Boot
product_meta.description: At Vasque, they are committed to making functional, innovative and aesthetic footwear that performs to the highest standards. Their ultimate goal is to make shoes that inspire you to get outdoors and embark on an adventure. Incorporating and developing new and innovative technologies into their boots is what keeps Vasque at the top of their game.
